|ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = 00:22:B0 |oui = 00:22:B0 |bootwait = |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = |exp_if_types = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Alpha Networks |manuf_model = WRG-N22 |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt (Was) |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = 2017 |fccapprovdate = 12/19/2008 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "8WRGN22..2A10" is silkscreened on the D1 board. There are multiple "D" revisions of this router ([[D-Link DIR-615 rev D1|D1]], [[D-Link DIR-615 rev D2|D2]], [[D-Link DIR-615 rev D3|D3]], [[D-Link DIR-615 rev D4|D4]], [[D-Link DIR-615 rev D5|D5]]).. :Power consumption: :5V/2.5A ([[D-Link DIR-615 rev D1|D1]]), 5V/1.2A ([[D-Link DIR-615 rev D3|D3]]) *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-615 ''D-Link DIR-615 series'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :DIR-615 rev [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-615/d1-photos/start D1] - 8WRGN22..2A10 (Spansion/Mira/Winbond) :DIR-615 rev [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-615/d2-photos/start D2] - 8WRGN22..2A1G (Macronix/Winbond) :DIR-615 rev [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-615/d3-photos/start D3] - 8WRGN22..2A1G (Spansion/Mira) :DIR-615 rev [https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dir-615/d4-photos/start D4] - 8WRGN24..3A1G (Macronix/Mira) :DIR-615 rev D5 - ESMT F25L32PA (Flash 4MB)/ ::ESMT M14D2561616A (RAM 32MB) {{see also|D-Link DIR-615 series}} ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=19281 On the '''OpenWrt''' forums] :(OUI, boot log, mention of telnet user:pass) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=70474 On the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=61108 Whats the staus for DIR-615 D1] On the '''DD-WRT''' forums *works here with j911's [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/download.php?id=12225 modified dir- 600 fw] see [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=61155&postdays=0&postorder=asc&highlight=dir615&start=15 Thread] On the '''DD-WRT''' forums ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRT |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = dir615d build 14929 20101208 |current_supported_version = ?
